lambdatarunner 0.3.0 API

Lambdata Runner is a JUnit runner which allows using lambdas to set up data-driven tests.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
org.lambdatarunner  
org.lambdatarunner.internal  
Lambdata Runner is a JUnit runner which allows using lambdas to set up data-driven tests. For details, see LambdataRunner. To get a quick feel for how it works, look at the following sample code: 
   import static org.lambdatarunner.Lambdata.*;
   import org.lambdatarunner.LambdataRunner;
   import org.lambdatarunner.TestSpecs;
   import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
   import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
   import org.junit.Test;

   @RunWith(LambdataRunner.class)
   public class MathTests {
     @Test
     @DescribeAs("for string ''{0}''")
     public TestSpecs testStringLength() {
       return specs(
         (string, length) -> assertEquals((int) length, string.length()),
         datum("", 0),
         datum("a", 1),
         datum("hello", 5));
     }
   }
